name: Stussy
text: On Play Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, play up to one 2 cost or lower character that contains the (CP) type other than "Stussy". Then, trash the rest.

effect.text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, play up to one 2 cost or lower character that contains the (CP) type other than "Stussy". Then, trash the rest.

meta.notes: Rarity is inferred from the 'C' symbol in the bottom right corner. The card is a Character type, and the 'CP0' type is printed below the name.
